description: Amachi Matsuri is another childhood friend of http://anidb.net/ch16566 [Makoto]. She has the highest academic scores among the group of friends, and stayed at a local school after their school`s closedown. Matsuri is considerably more inarticulate and anti-social after the reunion, as a result of taking Makoto`s comments before their separation too serious.
name: Amachi Matsuri
